title: Google Pixel 3a was working fine yesterday, but now carrier is reporting the phone as Blacklisted
content: My Google Pixel 3a was working fine yesterday, but now the carrier is reporting the phone as Blacklisted.  I called the carrier and they state that they did not black list the phone.  Rather, they stated the black list comes from the manufacturer.  I bought the phone through Google.  Is there a number or a way to contact google to get google to unblock my device?
